00011 
00012 //    Fixed is_pointer, is_reference, is_const, is_volatile, is_same, 
00013 //    is_member_pointer based on the Simulated Partial Specialization work 
00014 //    of Mat Marcus and Jesse Jones. See  http://opensource.adobe.com or 
00015 //    http://groups.yahoo.com/group/boost/message/5441 
00016 //    Some workarounds in here use ideas suggested from "Generic<Programming>: 
00017 //    Mappings between Types and Values" 
00018 //    by Andrei Alexandrescu (see http://www.cuj.com/experts/1810/alexandr.html).

00021 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00022 #define BOOST_TT_IS_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00023 
00024 #include "boost/type_traits/is_member_pointer.hpp"
00025 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_and.hpp"
00026 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_not.hpp"
00027 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00028 
00029 #ifdef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00030 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00031 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp"
00032 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_function_ptr_tester.hpp"
00033 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/false_result.hpp"
00034 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_or.hpp"
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 // should be the last #include
00038 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00039 
00040 namespace boost {
00041 
00042 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00043 
00044 namespace detail {
00045 
00046 template< typename T > struct is_pointer_helper
00047 {
00048     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false);
00049 };
00050 
00051 #   define TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC(helper,sp,result) \
00052 template< typename T > struct helper<sp> \
00053 { \
00054     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = result); \
00055 }; \
00056 
00057 
00058 TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC(is_pointer_helper,T*,true)
00059 TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC(is_pointer_helper,T* const,true)
00060 TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC(is_pointer_helper,T* volatile,true)
00061 TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC(is_pointer_helper,T* const volatile,true)
00062 
00063 #   undef TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_HELPER_PARTIAL_SPEC
00064 
00065 template< typename T >
00066 struct is_pointer_impl
00067 {
00068     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00069         (::boost::type_traits::ice_and<
00070               ::boost::detail::is_pointer_helper<T>::value
00071             , ::boost::type_traits::ice_not<
00072                 ::boost::is_member_pointer<T>::value
00073                 >::value
00074             >::value)
00075         );
00076 };
00077 
00078 } // namespace detail
00079 
00080 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_pointer,T,::boost::detail::is_pointer_impl<T>::value)
00081 
00082 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && !defined(__COMO__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x600)
00083 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_pointer,T&,false)
00084 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_pointer,T& const,false)
00085 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_pointer,T& volatile,false)
00086 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_1(typename T,is_pointer,T& const volatile,false)
00087 #endif
00088 
00089 #else // no partial template specialization
00090 
00091 namespace detail {
00092 
00093 struct pointer_helper
00094 {
00095     pointer_helper(const volatile void*);
00096 };
00097 
00098 yes_type BOOST_TT_DECL is_pointer_tester(pointer_helper);
00099 no_type BOOST_TT_DECL is_pointer_tester(...);
00100 
00101 template <bool>
00102 struct is_pointer_select
00103     : ::boost::type_traits::false_result
00104 {
00105 };
00106 
00107 template <>
00108 struct is_pointer_select<false>
00109 {
00110     template <typename T> struct result_
00111     {
00112         static T& make_t();
00113         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value =
00114                 (::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00115                     (1 == sizeof(is_pointer_tester(make_t()))),
00116                     (1 == sizeof(type_traits::is_function_ptr_tester(make_t())))
00117                 >::value));
00118     };
00119 };
00120 
00121 template <typename T>
00122 struct is_pointer_impl
00123     : is_pointer_select<
00124           ::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00125               ::boost::is_reference<T>::value
00126             , ::boost::is_array<T>::value
00127             >::value
00128         >::template result_<T>
00129 {
00130 };
00131 
00132 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pointer,void,false)
00133 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00134 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pointer,void const,false)
00135 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pointer,void volatile,false)
00136 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_pointer,void const volatile,false)
00137 #endif
00138 
00139 } // namespace detail
00140 
00141 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_pointer,T,::boost::detail::is_pointer_impl<T>::value)
00142 
00143 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00144 
00145 } // namespace boost
